title: Syncthing crashes on start on OpenBSD

labels.name: build
labels.description: Issues caused by or requiring changes to the build system (scripts or Docker image)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
